definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: B. emotion you rich suggestible sub-soft on the people of unsuspecting heart.
sentences.chinese: 你情感丰富，耳根子软，对人毫无防备之心。

sentences.english: And he would blush to his ears with emotion.
sentences.chinese: 他会激动得连耳根子都红了。

sentences.english: In fact, they laughed and they laughed, which made the little blacksmith's ears turn red.
sentences.chinese: 人们不停地笑啊笑，把小铁匠的耳根子都笑红了。

definition: to blush/to redden (with shame, indignation etc)
self-respect of old person/face/thick-skinned (i.e. impervious to criticism)/brazen
lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.)/to have ants in one's pants/hyperactive/adventurous and uncontrollable
ashamed and unable to show one's face
